scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Wilder informs his correspondent that the action of the German Republic is taking away the charter of an [unnamed] Institute "for not living up to its announced program." This information came from the secretary of the American Academy via the cultural attache of the German Embassy.
